org.drip.xva.strategy

Class BurgardKjaerVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.xva.strategy.BurgardKjaerVertex

  • public class BurgardKjaerVertex
extends java.lang.Object
    BurgardKjaerVertex holds the Vertex Realizations off an Imperfect Hedge Based Incremental Burgard Kjaer Simulation Step. The References are: - Burgard, C., and M. Kjaer (2011): PDE Representations of Derivatives with Bilateral Counter Party Risk and Funding Costs, Journal of Credit Risk, 7 (3) 1-19. - Burgard, C., and M. Kjaer (2011): In the Balance, Risk, 22 (11) 72-75. - Burgard, C., and M. Kjaer (2013): Funding Costs and Funding Strategies, Risk, 24 (12) 82-87. - Hull, J., and A. White (2012): The FVA Debate, Risk, 23 (7) 83-85. - Piterbarg, V. (2010): Funding Beyond Discounting: Collateral Agreements and Derivatives Pricing, Risk 21 (2) 97-102.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
